Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night, and we need to vote him out today to protect the town."
You: "Charlie is lying to protect himself as mafia. If he were the detective, why accuse so quickly without hearing from others?"

Charlie: "Bob is trying to sow doubt to save himself. As the detective, I had to act quickly to protect the town. Let's focus on the facts: my investigation revealed Bob is the mafioso."
